com.cloudera.oryx.lambda

Class AbstractSparkLayer<K,M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.lambda.AbstractSparkLayer<K,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - input topic key type
    M - input topic message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchLayer, SpeedLayer

    public abstract class AbstractSparkLayer<K,M>
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Encapsulates commonality between Spark-based layer processes, BatchLayer and SpeedLayer
